org.apache.archiva.components.graph.api

Class TraversalStatus<V extends Node<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.components.graph.api.TraversalStatus<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - 

    public class TraversalStatus<V extends Node<V>>
extends Object
    This class gives information about the status of the graph traversal. It holds the errors encountered and information about detected cycles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TraversalStatus()

      Returns the nodes, where cycles were detected.
      List<VisitError<V>> getErrorList()
      Returns the list of errors
      boolean hasCycles()
      Returns true, if the traversal encountered a cycle.
      boolean hasErrors()
      Returns true, if there were errors while running the consumer function.

      Add another cycle to the counter

      • getErrorList

        public List<VisitError<V>> getErrorList()
        Returns the list of errors
        Returns:
        a list of errors encountered while executing the consumer function on nodes

      • hasErrors

        public boolean hasErrors()
        Returns true, if there were errors while running the consumer function.
        Returns:
        true, if errors occured on the consumer function, otherwise false

                     Throwable e)
        Add the given error to the list.
        Parameters:
        node - the node, where the error occurred
        e - the exception

      • hasCycles

        public boolean hasCycles()
        Returns true, if the traversal encountered a cycle.
        Returns:
        true, if cycle was encountered, otherwise false

      • getCycleCount

        public int getCycleCount()
        Returns the number of detected cycles.
        Returns:
        the number of cycles

      • getCycleNodes

        public List<V> getCycleNodes()
        Returns the nodes, where cycles were detected. The list may contain duplicated entries, if cycles where detected on different paths.
        Returns:
        the list of nodes where cycles were detected
